creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: seven panels sewn together; rows of inky blue and white three-pronged designs at top and bottom of straight lines; interspersed with rows of inky blue and white balls; one straight row of inky blue and white triangles with one blue and white zigzag design to the side of the triangle line; indigo background; two short fringed edges
title: Panel
